incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to CTBC Cellular SA Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS Delivery failures to the CTBC Cellular SA network in Brazil over a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations are still working on the fix. The carrier has deployed several changes over the past few days. While we are still seeing higher than normal provisioning times and timeouts while provisioning, we are seeing improvements.  We will provide updates in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations and are continuing to work on the fix. The carrier has deployed several changes over the past few days. While we are still seeing higher than normal provisioning times and timeouts while provisioning, we are seeing improvements.  We will provide updates in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting an emergency maintenance from 03 May 2024 at 15:00 PDT until 03 May 2024 at 22:25 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, May 4th, 2024, at 00:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 3 hours. During the maintenance window ETL loads will be affected.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 06 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 29 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

06 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 06 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT
08 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 08 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT
13 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 13 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT
15 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 15 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT
20 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 20 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT
22 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 22 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT
27 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 27 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT
29 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 29 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and France is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 13 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 23 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures to Twilio Germany, and to and from France phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

13 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 13 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT
15 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 15 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT
21 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 21 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT
23 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 23 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT
